labels.name: age-assurance
labels.description: Related to age assurance or age verification

labels.name: encryption
labels.description: Related to encryption or encryption policy.

labels.name: IAB-action-request
labels.description: An item where the IAB either has been or will likely be requested to decide whether to take action.

labels.name: IGF
labels.description: Related to the Internet Governance Forum (IGF)

labels.name: Informational
labels.description: For informing the IAB but not requiring further action

labels.name: internet-governance
labels.description: Related to the area of Internet governance

labels.name: sign-on-opportunity
labels.description: An opportunity for the IAB to sign on to an joint letter or statement.

labels.name: WSIS
labels.description: Related to the World Summit on the Information Society (WSIS)

issues.title: Remove affiliations for authors for an IAB stream document
issues.author: dhruvdhody
issues.body:
We don't include our affiliations in the IAB stream documents. 

See https://wiki.ietf.org/group/iab/iab-stream-rfc-format

pulls.title: Some initial grammar nits.
pulls.author: wkumari
pulls.body: I have some larger questions, which I'll add to the tracking issue.

comments.author: wkumari
comments.body:
Weird. I just discovered that I can only list a single reviewer on this PR - adding Mark removes Suresh, and re-adding Suresh removes Mark...

The "Reviewers" section says:`Request up to 1 reviewer` ...
